translation: Ae lvukv, pnnis rbs khvucziv yymụ̄ tvhụ̄ akhi janh nishhi pạd krinav th tamy janh nishhi bnvvun tamiyuk jvr th yimv doshvyv sintụ̄ phhlạvin dunyahs andr varyah mrd th mstvurath, ts khudays khvucziv yymụ̄ sund vasṭh dith akh akis chihv pnnụ̄ ḥq mngan, byyhi kriv rshth th qrabtkụ̄ tʿlqat bgarrnh nishhi prhyz, zạniv zi Allah tʿālyā chuh tohyih pytth ngrạny kran.
Ytymn hndụ̄ mal diyiv timn vaps, aṣl mal mah bdlạviv khrab malh sintụ̄ th tihndụ̄ mal mah khyyiv pnnis mals sintụ̄ ralạvith, yih chuh varyah bvdd gnah.

Th agr tohyih andyshh āshi zi ytymn sintụ̄ hykiv nh anṣaf krith tylhi yimh mstvrath tohyih psnd yinv timav mnz kriv don don, tryn tryn, czon czon sintụ̄ nkaḥ. (yih kth chhe mdi nẓr thavnụ̄ zi yih āyt ạs nh akhi khoth zyadh khandarinhi krnh kis ajazts mnz āmcz tikyazi yih nạzil spdinh brvntthe ạs yih kạm jạyz th khod āsh rsvl Allah ṣly Allah ʿlyh v slmn akhi khoth zyadh gr vajinhi tamhi vqth mvjvd. Draṣl ạs yih amhi mvjvb nạzil gmcz zi lrrayn mnz shhyd spdn valyn hndụ̄ yim ytym shurụ̄ pth kun ạsụ̄ rvudimtụ̄ tihndụ̄ msạyl ḥl krnh mvjvub āv frmavnh zi agr timn ytymn hndụ̄ ḥqvq yithh pạtthụ̄ hykiv nh ada krith tylhi kriv timn monddn sintụ̄ nkaḥ yimn ytym shurụ̄ sintụ̄ āsn.) albth agr tohyih andyshhi āsyv zi timn sintụ̄ hykiv nh ʿdl krith tylhi kriv akạe znanh. (ath kthhi pytth chuh aumt kyn fqhahn hund ajmaʿ zi amhi āyt kh dhryʿh chuh tʿdadi azvaj mḥdvd krnh āmut th byk vqt czvrav khoth zyadh gr vajinhi thavnh nishhi chuh tthakh krnh āmut. Aamhi ʿlavh chhe yih āyt tʿdadi aazvaj kis jvazs ʿdlh kis shrṭs sintụ̄ mshrvṭ kran. Yus shkhṣ ʿdluk shrṭ pvur chuhnh kran mgr akhi khoth zyadh gr vajinhi krnh kis ajazts chuh fạydh tulan suh chuh khudays sintụ̄ dgha bạzy kran. Aslạmy ḥkvmt chn ʿdaltn chuh yih ḥq ḥạṣl zi yymis khandarnhi ya yimn khandarinyn sintụ̄ suh anṣaf āshi nh kran timn krin dar rsy. Kynhh lukh chih ahli mghrb kyv nẓryatav nishhi mghlvb th mrʿūb spdith yih thạbt krnch kvshsh kran zi qrānuk aṣly mqṣd avs tʿdadi aazvajuk ṭryqh (yus nqṭh nẓr kinụ̄ draṣl bur ṭryqh chuh) mittavun. Mgr aamhi qsmh chih kthh chhe draṣl mḥẓ dhhny ghlạmy hund ntyjhi. Tʿdadi azvajuk fy nfshi akh burạyy āsun chuh khod naqạbli tslym, tikyazi kynczhn ḥalatn mnz chuh yih chyz akh tmduny th akhlaqy ẓrvrt bnan. Qrānn chuh ṣryḥ lfẓn mnz yih jạyz qrar dytmut th vargh pạtthụ̄ thi chuhn nh amhi kis mdhmts mnz kanhh tiyuth lfẓ thi vartvvmut yymhi sintụ̄ mʿlvm spdi zi fy alvaqʿ chuh suh ath bnd krun yczhan.) ya niyvukh timh mstvurath pnnis zvjyts mnz yimh tuhndis qbẓs mnz chhe āmcz. (murad chhe lvunddyih, yʿny timh mstvurath yimh jngs andr grftar spdith āmcz āsn th jng kyn asyirn hund tbadlh nh spdan kis ṣvrts mnz āsn ḥkvmt kh ṭrfh lukn mnz bạgravnh āmcz.) be anṣạfy nishhi bchnh khạṭr chuh yih nyk ʿmlhi zyadh nkhh.
Th mstvuratn hund mahr kriv khosh dily san (frẓ zạnith) ada albth agr timh panh pnnhi khvshy san mahruk kanhh ḥṣh tohyih mʿāf krn tylhi hykiv tvhụ̄ suh mzh san khyth.
Th pnnụ̄ tim mal yim khudayn tuhndi khạṭr zndgy qạyim thavnkụ̄ dhryʿh chih bnạvimtụ̄, mah kriv nadan lukn ḥvalh albth diyiv timn khynh khạṭr th lagnh mokhh th timn kriv nyk hdayt.

Th ytymn rvuziv āzmạysh kran yvt tam zn tim nikaḥs qạbl vạnshi vatn. (yʿny yylhi tim balgh āsn hyvan spdun, tylhi rvuziv vuchhan zi tihund ʿqly nshv v nma kiyuth chuh th timn mnz kth ḥds tam chhe pnnụ̄ mʿāmlat panh khvd pnnhi dhmh dary san pknavnch ṣlạḥyt pạd spzmcz.) pth agr tohyih timn mnz ahlyt basyv tylhi kriv tihndụ̄ mal timn ḥvalh, yinh zanhh yih kriv zi anṣaf kh ḥd nishhi ddlith khyyiv tihndụ̄ mal amhi khvfh jldy jldy zi bddụ̄ gczihth krn tim pnnhi ḥquk muṭalbh, ytym sund yus srprst maldar āshi suh hyyin prhyz gạry kạm th yus ghryb āshi suh khyyin mʿrvf ṭryqh. (yʿny pnnhi khdmtuk ḥq rttin aath ḥds tam zi prth kanhh ghyr janbdar mʿqvl ansan gczihh aath munạsib tslym krun. Aamhi ʿlavh yikynczhah khdmtuk ḥq suh ratthi, thi gczihnh czvuri czihyphi rattun blkh gczihh aʿlanyh muqrr krith rattun, byyhi gczihh tamiyuk ḥsab thavun.) pth yylhi tihindụ̄ mal timn ḥvalh hyyiv krnụ̄ tylhi thạviyvukh aath pytth lukh gvah th ḥsab hynh mokhh chuh Allah tʿālyā sytthah.

Mardan khạṭr chuh tamhi malh mnz ḥṣh yus mạlụ̄ majhi th qryby rshth darav āshi pth kun trvvmut th mstvuratn khạṭr thi chuh tmhi malh mnz ḥṣh yus mạlụ̄ majhi th qryby rshth darav āshi pth kun trvvmut khvah suh km ạsitn ya zyadh, (yath āyts mnz chih vaẓḥ ṭvr panczh qanvny ḥkm dinh āmtụ̄, akh yih zi myrath chuhnh ṣrf mrdn hunde yvt ḥṣh blkh chhe mstvrath thi amhi chih ḥqdar. Dvyum yih zi myrath gczihh bhrḥal bạgravnh yun khvah suh kvtah thi km āsitn. Tryym yih zi yath āyts mnz chuh myth sund pth kun trvvmut svrue mal qabli tqsym qrar dinh āmut th aath mnz chuhnh mnqvlh th ghyr mnqvlh, zrʿī ya ghyr zrʿī, ābạyy th ghyr ābạyy huk tfryq krnh āmut. Czvurim chuh aamhi nishhi pe lgan zi muvrth (yymụ̄ snz vratht āshi) snzi zndgy mnz chuhnh kanhh ḥqi myrath pạd spdan blkh chuh myrathuk ḥq tmhi vqth pạd spdan yylhi muvrith kanhh mal trạvith guzryvmut āshi. Pvunczim zi amhi nishhi chuh yih qạʿdh thi nyran zi qryb tr rshth dar snzi mvjvdgy mnz hykhi nh dvur drazuk rshth dar varatht ḥạṣl krith. Brvntth kun chhe aamy qạʿdch tshryḥ āyt nmbr 11 kis ạkhrs th āyt nmbr 33 hs mnz krnh āmcz.) th yih ḥṣh chuh (Allah tʿālyā sndi ṭrfh) muqrr.
Th yylhi bạgravnh kis mvqʿs pytth rshth dar, ytym th mskyn yin, aamhi malh mnz diyiv timn thi kynhh th timn sintụ̄ kriv rtụ̄ pạtthụ̄ kth.

Lukn pzi aamhi kthhi hund khyal krith khvczun zi agr tim panh khod path kun be bs avlad travhan, th mrnh vqth kithụ̄ andyshhi gczhhan timn pnnyn shuryn hindis ḥqs mnz laḥq, lhādha khvczin tim khudays th syzrch kth krin.
Yim lukh ẓulmh san ytymn hund mal chih khyvan drḥqyqt chih tim nar sintụ̄ pnnụ̄ shikm bran th tim yin ẓrvr jhnm kis nar aalavs mnz travnh.

Tuhndyn avladn mtʿlq chuh Allah tʿālyā tohyih hdayt divan zi, mrd sund ḥṣh chuh don mstvratn brabr, (chvnkh shryʿtn chuh khandạny zndgy mnz mrds pytth mʿạshy dhmh dạriyn hund zyadh bar trvvmut th mstvrat chahn varyahav mʿāshy dhmh dạriyav nishhi skbdvsh thavimacz, lhādha avs ainṣafuk tqaẓh yiy zi myrath mnz gvczh khatvnhi hund ḥṣh mrds bh nsbt km yun thavnh) agr (myth snz vạrith) doyv khoth zyadh kvri āsn tylhi gczihh timn z thạyy dinh yun. (yohe ḥukm chuh don kvryn hund thi. Mṭlb chuh yih zi agr kạnshi shkhṣs nychuv āshi nh kynhh blkh āsns kvre yacz, khvah zh kvri āsns ya doyv khoth zyadh, bhr ḥal spdi kul vrathtuk 3/2 yum ḥṣh yimn kvryn mnz tqsym th baqy 3/1 yum ḥṣh spdi baqy vạrithn mnz tqsym. Albth agr myts ṣrf aakve lrrkh āshi tylhi chuh aath pytth ajmaʿ zi baqyn vạrithn hnzi ghyr mvjvdgy mnz bnhi suh sary maluk vạrith, th agr baqy vạrth mvjvd āsn, timn yiyhi pnun ḥṣh dinh th baqy svrue mal mylhi amụ̄se.) th hrgah akạe kvur vạrth āshi tylhi chhe nṣf vratht tmụ̄ snz. Agr myt ṣaḥbi avlad āshi tylhi gczihh tmụ̄ sndyv valdynv mnz prth kạnshi vratht mnz shyum ḥṣh mylun. (yʿny myth sndis ṣaḥbi avlad āsnh kis ṣvurts mnz āshi bhrḥal myth sndyv valdynv mnz prth kanhh 2/1 ḥṣuk ḥqdar khvah myth snz vạrith ṣrf kvre yạcz āsitn ya nychivy yạtụ̄ ya āsitn nychivụ̄ th kvri ya āsitn akh nychuv ya akh kvur, rvudụ̄ vonụ̄ baqy 3/2 ḥṣh yimn mnz āsn baqy vạrith shryk) th agr suh ṣaḥbi avlad avsnh th mvl mvj āshi tmụ̄ sund vạrith tylhi gczihh majhi yun tryym ḥṣh dinh. (mạlis majhi vrạe agr byyhi kanhh vạrith avsnh tylhi mylhi baqy ḥṣh mạlis. Nath yiyhi 3/2 ḥṣh mạlis th baqy vạrithn dinh.) th agr myts bạe bynhi thi āsn tylhi āshi mvj shymhi ḥṣch ḥqdar. (bạe bynhi āsnh kis ṣvurts mnz chuh majhi hund ḥṣh 3/1 kh bjayih 6/1 krnh āmut. Yithh pạtthụ̄ yus majhi hndi ḥṣh mnz 6/1 ḥṣh ninh āv suh yiyhi mạlụ̄ sndis ḥṣs mnz travnh tikyazi aath ṣvrts mnz chhe mạlụ̄ snz dhmh dạriyih huran. Yih rvuzin vaẓḥ zi agr myth sndiụ̄ valdyn zndh āsn tylhi chuhnh tmụ̄ snzn bynyn bayn ḥṣh vatan. Yim sạry ḥṣh yin tamhi vqth krrnh) yylhi so vṣyt yosh mytn krmcz āshi, pvur yiyhi krnh th yus qrẓ ts pytth āshi suh yiyhi nkhh valnh. (vṣytch dhkr agrchhi qrẓh brvnhh chhe krnh āmcz albth aumtuk chuh aath pytth ajmaʿ zi qrẓ chuh vṣyts pytth mqdm. Yʿny agr myts qrẓ āshi tylhi yiyhi sarve brvnhh myt sndi travnh āmthi malh mnz suh nkhh valnh, pth yiyhi vṣyt pvur krnh th amhi pth spdi vratht tqsym.) tvhụ̄ chihv nh zanan zi tuhndis mạlis majhi th tuhndyn avladn mnz kus chuh nfʿ lḥaẓh tohyih zyadh nkhh. Yim ḥṣh chih khudayn muqrr krimtụ̄ th Allah tʿālyā chuh yqynaan sarive ḥqyqtv nishhi vạqf th sare mṣlḥth zann vvl.

Th tuhnzv khandarinyv yikynczhah trvvmut āshi, tamiyuk nṣf mylyv tohyih agr timh be avlad āsn nath chuh avlad āsnh kis ṣvurts mnz pth kun travnh āmthi mạluk 4/1 ḥṣh tuhund yylhi so vṣyt pvur yiyhi krnh yosh timv krmcz āshi, th yus qrẓ timv pth kun trvvmut āshi suh yiyhi nkhh valnh, th timh āsn tuhndi trkh mnz czvurimhi ḥṣh chih ḥqdar agr tvhụ̄ be avlad ạsiv nath āshi ṣaḥbi avlad āsnh kis ṣvurts mnz ạtthim ḥṣh timn hund. (yʿny khvah akh khandarinụ̄ ạsitn ya ạsitn akhi khoth zyadh, avlad āsnh kis ṣvurts mnz āsn timh 8/1 chih th avlad nh āsnh kis ṣvurts mnz āsn 4/1 chih ḥṣh dar. Th yih 4/1 ya 8/1 yiyhi sarine khandarinyn mnz brabry san bạgravnh.) amhi pth zi yosh vṣyt tohyih krmcz āsyv so yiyhi pvur krnh th yus qrẓ tohyih trvvmut āsyv suh yiyhi nkhh valnh. Th agr suh mrd ya znanh (yymụ̄ sund myrath bạgravun āshi) be avlad thi āshi th tmụ̄ sund mvl mvj thi āshi nh zindh mgr tmụ̄ sund akh bve ya akh bynhi āshi mvjvd tylhi mylhi bạys th bynhi prth akis shyym ḥṣh th. Agr bạe bynhi akhi khoth zyadh āsn tylhi āsn tim kul trkh kis akh thạyy mnz sạry shryk. (yath āyts mtʿlq chuh mfsrn hund ajmaʿ zi aath mnz chuh bayv th bynyv nishhi murad aakhyafy (vor) bạe th bynhi yʿny yim myts sintụ̄ ṣrf majhi hndi ṭrfh rshth āsn thavan (majhi āsn kuny) th mvl āshi timn byakh. Rvudụ̄ vonụ̄ skh bạe bynhi, th tim vor bạe bynhi yim mạlụ̄ sndi ṭrfh myts sintụ̄ rshth āsn thavan, tihund ḥukm chuh yymy svurkis ạkhry āyts mnz arshad spudmut.) aamhi pth zi yosh vṣyt krnh āshi āmcz so yiyhi pvur krnh, th qrẓ yus mytn trvvmut āshi yiyhi nkhh valnh bshrṭykh suh āshi nh ẓrr rsan. (vṣyts mnz chhe ẓrr rsạny yih zi tithh pạtthụ̄ yiyhi vṣyt krnh yymhi sintụ̄ mstḥq rshth darn hndụ̄ ḥqvq tlf spdan āsn. Th qrẓs mnz chhe ẓrr rsạny yih zi ansan kri mḥẓ ḥq darn mḥrvm krnh khạṭr khvah mkhvah pans pytth tithhi qrẓuk aqrar yus tmụ̄ hiyvt mutue āshi nh, ya kri byyhi kanhh tiyuth czhl yymiyuk mqṣd yih āshi zi ḥqdar gczhn myrath nishhi mḥrvm spdnụ̄.) yih ḥukm chuh Allah tʿālyā sndi ṭrfh th Allah tʿālyā chuh dana v byna th nrm khoe.

Yim chih Allah tʿālyā sndụ̄ mqrr krnh āmtụ̄ ḥd, yus Allah tʿālyā snz th rsvl ṣly Allah ʿlyh v slmn hnz aṭaʿt kri ts kri khuda tithyn baghn mnz dạkhl yimn bnụ̄ kinụ̄ kolh āsn pkan th yimn baghn mnz rvzi suh hmyshh th yhe chhe bdd kạmyạby.

Th yus Allah tʿālyā snz th rsvl ṣly Allah ʿlyh v slmn hnz nafrmạny kri th tmụ̄ sndyv mqrr krnh āmtyv ḥdav nishhi czlhi nybr, ts travi Allah tʿālyā nars yath mnz suh hmyshh rvzi th ts khạṭr chuh rusva krn vvl ʿdhab.

Tuhnzv mstvuratav mnz yimh bdkạry hund aatur krn timn pytth rttiv pnnyv mnz czon nfrn hnz gvạhy th agr czvr nfr gvạhy din, tylhi thạviyvukh timh grn mnz bnd yvt tam zn timn mvt yiyhi ya krri Allah tʿālyā tihindi khạṭr kanhh vath.

Th tohyih mnz yim aamhi kamhi hund aatur krn timn doshvnụ̄ diyiv tklyf pth agr tim tvbh krn th pnun aṣlaḥ krn tylhi trạviyvukh ylh tikyazi Allah tʿālyā chuh sytthah tvbh qbvl krn vvl th rḥm krn vvl. (yih avs bdkạry mtʿlq abtdạyy ḥukm. Amhi pth spz svrh nvurch so āyt nạzil yth mnz mrds th znanhi doshvnụ̄ khạṭr kunue ḥukm dinh āv zi timn gczhn hth hth dur yinụ̄ lgavnh.)

Yih zạniv zi khudays pytth chuh tvbh kh qbvlytuk ḥq timne lukn khạṭr yimn nadạnụ̄ kinụ̄ kanhh aatur chuh gczhan, th amhi pth chih jldy tvbh kran, yithyn lukn pytth chuh Allah tʿālyā pnnhi nẓri ʿnayt sintụ̄ byyhi tvjh divan, th Allah tʿālyā chuh sarine kthn hnz khbr thavn vvl byyhi ḥkmt vvl gattul.

Albth tvbh chuhnh timn lukn khạṭr kynhh yim bur kamhi kran chih rvzan, yvt tam zan timv mnz kạnshi hndi mvtuk vqt chuh vatan, tmhi vizi chuh suh vnan zi vonụ̄ kvr me tvbh, th yithe pạtthụ̄ chuhnh tvbh timn lukn khạṭr thi yim mrns tam kạfr rvzn, yithyn lukn khạṭr chuh aashi dg tulvun ʿdhab tyar thvvmut.

Ae lvukv yimv ayman chuhv avnmut, tuhndi khạṭr chuhnh yih ḥlal zi zbrdsty rvuziv znann hndụ̄ vạrth bnith. (amhi nishhi chuh murad yih zi khandar sndi mrnh pth mah rvuzin tmụ̄ sndụ̄ khandan vạlụ̄ ts monddi znanhi myth sund myrath zạnith tmụ̄ sndụ̄ vly th vạrth bnith. Khandarinhi yylhi khandar mvud so chhe pth āzad. ʿiidt guzarith yvt yyczihh tvt gczihn th ys sintụ̄ nkaḥ krun yyczihh ts sintụ̄ krin.) th nh chuh yih ḥlal zi timh kryvukh tng th tamhi mhruk kynhh ḥṣh ninch kriv kvshsh yus tohyih timn diytmut chuhv. Ā, agr timh kunhi ttakarh bdchlny hinz mrtkb āsn (tylhi chuh ẓrvr tohyih tng krnuk ḥq, mal ninh mvjvub nh kynhh blkh bdchlny hund sza dinh mvjvub) timn sintụ̄ kriv rtụ̄ pạtthụ̄ zndgy bsr, agr tohyih timh napsnd āsn bnan chuh zi akh chyz āsyv nh tohyih psnd mgr khudayn āshi tthụ̄ mnz varyah kynhh rczar thvvmut.

Th agr tvhụ̄ akis khandarnhi hnzi jayih byakh khandarinụ̄ aannuk airade kriv, tylhi agr tohyih ts akis ddhyrs yvt male kyazi āsyv nh diytumt, tmhi mnz hyyih ziyvs nh kihinụ̄ vaps, kya tvhụ̄ hyvh ts bhtan lgạvith th ttakar ẓlm krith vaps?
Th ạkhr kithh pạtthụ̄ hyvus yylhi zan tvhụ̄ akh akis nishhi chihv lṭf andvz spdụ̄mtụ̄ th timv chuhhav tohyih pkhth ʿhd hyvtmut?

Th yimn mstvratn sintụ̄ tuhndyv malyv nkaḥ āshi kvrmut timn sintụ̄ mah kriv hrgz nkaḥ mgr yih goddh spud thi spud. (aamyuk chuhnh yih mṭlb zi zmanh jạhlyts andr yymụ̄ vor majhi sintụ̄ nkaḥ avs kvrmut suh hykhi yih ḥkm yinh pth thi ts pnnis zvjyts mnz thạvith, blkh chuh mṭlb yih zi godd yim aamhi qsmkụ̄ nkaḥ krnh āmtụ̄ ạsụ̄ timv nishhi zamtụ̄ shurụ̄ yin nh yih ḥkm yinh pth ḥramkụ̄ mannh, th nh hykhi pnnyn malyn hndi vratht mnz tihund ḥq khtm spdith.) drḥqyqt chhe yih be ḥyạyy hnz akh kạm, napsndydh chhe byyhi chhe nakarh. (aslạmy qanvns mnz chhe yih kạm fvjdạry jurm th aath pytth hykhi pvlys karvạyy krith.)

Tohyih pytth āyih ḥram krnh tuhnz majhi. (majhi hund aṭlaq chuh pnnhi majhi th vor majhi doshvnụ̄ pytth spdan, amhi mvjvub chhe doshve ḥram. Amhi ʿlavh chhe athụ̄ ḥkms mnz mạlụ̄ snz mvj th majhi hnz mvj thi shạmil), kvri (kvri hndis ḥukms mnz chhe nychivụ̄ snz kvur th kvri hnz kvur thi shạml), bynhi (pnnụ̄ bynhi th vor bynhi chhe aath ḥkms mnz yksan.), pophh th mash, bavz th bynz, (yimn sarine rshtn mnz chahnh pnnyn th voran drmyan kanhh frq) th tuhnz timh majhi yimv tohyih dod ạsyv diytmut th tuhnz dod bynhi, (yath kthhi pytth chuh aumts mnz atfaq zi akụ̄ lrrkn ya lrrky yymis khatvnhi hund dod āshi chvmut ts khạṭr chhe so khatvn majhi hindis ḥkms mnz th tmụ̄ sund khandar chuhs mạlụ̄ sndis ḥkms mnz, th tmam tim rishth yim aṣly majhi th mạlụ̄ sndi tʿlq sintụ̄ ḥram chih spdan, chih dod majhi th mạlụ̄ sndi tʿlq sintụ̄ thi ḥram spdan. Ts shuris khạṭr chuhnh dod majhi hund sue shur ḥram ys sintụ̄ tmụ̄ dod āshi chvmut blkh chih tmụ̄ sndụ̄ sạry avlad ts pnnyn bayn pnnyn hndụ̄ pạtthụ̄ th tihindụ̄ shurụ̄ chih ts khạṭr pnnyn bapthrn th bynthrn hndụ̄ pạtthụ̄.) th tuhnzn khandarinyn hnz majhi (hash majhi) th tuhnzn khandarinyn hnz kvri yimv tuhnzn kochhn mnz prvrsh lbmcz chhe (yʿny) timn khandarinyn hnz kvri yimn sintụ̄ tuhund tʿlq don bạczn hund spudmut āshi. (yiczhh lrrky hund ḥram āsun chuhnh ath shrṭs pytth mvqvf zi tmụ̄ āshi vor mạlụ̄ sndis grs mnz prvrsh ḥạṣl krmcz. Aumt kyn fqhahn hund chuh ath kthhi pytth tqrybaan ajmaʿ zi vor kvur chhe bhr ḥal ansans pytth ḥram khvah tmụ̄ vor mạlụ̄ sndi gr prvrish ḥạṣl ạsitn krmcz ya mth ạsitn.) nath agr (ṣrf nkaḥ āshi spudmut th) don bạczn hund tʿlq āshi nh spudmut tylhi (yiyih nh tohyih timh trạvith tihnzn kvryn sintụ̄ nkaḥ krns pytth) prczhh gạr krnh, th tuhndyn timn nychviyn hnz khandarinhi yim tuhundi pushtkụ̄ āsn. (nychvụ̄ sndiy pạtthụ̄ chhe zuryn hnz khandarinhi thi buddibabn pytth ḥram.) th yithi chuh tohyih pytth ḥram krnh āmut zi yikh vtth thạviyvukh z bynnhi nkaḥs mnz. (nby ṣly Allah ʿlyh v slmn hund chuh arshad zi mas th bynz th poph th bavz thi chhe ykh vtth nkaḥs mnz thavinhi ḥram. Ath mʿāmls mnz gczihh yih aṣvl smjuhn zi ticzhh zh znanh jmʿ krnhi chuh bhrḥal ḥram yimn mnz agr akh mrd āshi he tylhi āshi he tmụ̄ sund nkaḥ dvyimhi sintụ̄ ḥram.) mgr yih godd spud thi spud, Allah tʿālyā chuh bkhshn vvl th rḥm krn vvl. (yʿny aath pytth spdi nh prczhh gạr mgr yymụ̄ shkhṣn kufrkis ḥalts andr zh bynhi ykh vtth nkaḥs mnz āsn thavimcz ts chhe aslam aannh pth akh thavnụ̄ th akh travnụ̄)

Th timh mstvurath thi chhe tohyih pytth ḥram yimh byyhi kạnshi hndis nkaḥs mnz āsn (mḥṣnat), albth ticzhh mstvurath chhe amhi nishhi mustthnyā yimh (jngs mnz) tohyih aths mnz yin. (yʿny yimh mstvrath jng mnz grftar spdn th tihndụ̄ kạfr khandar āsn daru alḥrbs mnz timh chahnh ḥram, tikyaz daru alḥrbh pytthh daru alaslams mnz yinh pth spdụ̄ tihndụ̄ nkaḥ khtm.) yih chuh Allah tʿālyā sund qanvn yymich pabndy tohyih pytth lạzim chhe krnh āmcz. Yimn vrạe yiczah mstvrath chhe, tuhndi khạṭr chuh ḥlal krnh āmut zi timh hykiyvukh tvhụ̄ pnnyv malav dhryʿh ḥạṣl krith bshrṭykh nkaḥ kis gndds mnz kriyvukh tim mḥfvẓ, nah yih zi āzad shhvt rạny lạgiv krnụ̄, pth yus tvhụ̄ azdvạjy zndgy hund luṭf timn nishhi ḥạṣl kriv, tamhi bdlh kriv tihndụ̄ mahr bṭvr frẓ zạnith ada, albth mhr mqrr spdnh pth agr akh akụ̄ snzi rẓa mndy san tohyih drmyan kanhh smjhvth spdi tylhi chuhnh tth mnz kanhh ḥrj, Allah tʿālyā chuh zann vvl th dana.

Th yas shkhṣas tohyih mnz yih ṭaqt āshi nh zi khandạnụ̄ mslman mstvratn (muḥṣnatn) sintụ̄ kri nkaḥ ts pzi tuhnzv timv lvnddiyv mnz kạnshi sintụ̄ nkaḥ krun yimh tuhndis qbẓs mnz āsn th mvmn (khatvnh) āsn, Allah tʿālyā chuh tuhndyn aymann hund ḥal tthyk pạtthụ̄ zanan, tvhụ̄ sạry chihv aaky darikụ̄ lukh lhādha kriv tihindyn srprstn hndi ajazth timn sintụ̄ nkaḥ th mʿrvf ṭryqh san kriv tihindụ̄ mahr ada takh timh rvzn nkaḥ kis gndds mnz mḥfvẓ (muḥṣnat) bnith, āzad shhvt rạny kran phyrn nh th nah krn czvuri czhyphi ạshnạyiyih, pth yylhi timh nkaḥ kis gndds mnz mḥfvẓ spdn, th aamhi pth spdn kunhi bdchlny hnz mrtkb, tylhi chuh timn pytth tamhi sza bh nsbt avddue sza yus khandạnụ̄ mstvratn (mḥṣnatn) khạṭr muqrr chuh. (yth rkvʿs mnz chuh muḥṣnat don mkhtlf mʿnyn mnz vrtavnh āmut, akh khandr vajinhi mstvrath ymn khandar snz ḥfaẓt ḥạṣl āshi. Dvyum khandạnụ̄ mstvrath yimn khandanch ḥfaẓt ḥạṣl āshi, agrchhi timh nytr vajinhi āsn nh. Āyt 24 has mnz chuh muḥṣnat lfẓ lvnddy hndi mqablh bghyr khandr vajinyn khandạnụ̄ mstvratn khạṭr vartavnh āmut yithh pạtthụ̄ zn āyt kh mẓmvn nishhi ṣaf ẓạhr chuh. Aath brʿks chuh lvnddiyn khạṭr mḥṣnat lfẓ goddinikis mʿnys mnz vrtavnh āmut th ṣaf lfẓn mnz chuh frmavnh āmut zi yylhi yimn nkahch ḥfaẓt ḥạṣl spdi (faaidhaa auḥṣin) tylhi chuh yimn khạṭr bdkạry spdns pytth tmhi szahuk nṣf yus muḥṣnatn yʿny bghyri khandar vajinyn khandạnụ̄ mstvratn khạṭr chuh.) yih shvlyt chhe tohyih mnz timn lukn khạṭr pạd krnh āmcz, yimn khandr nah krnh kinụ̄ prhyzgạry hund tthvtth phuttnuk andyshh āshi albth agr tvhụ̄ ṣbr kriv tylhi chuh yih tuhndi khạṭr bhtr th Allah tʿālyā chuh bkhshnh vvl th rḥm krn vvl.

Allah tʿālyā chuh yczhan zi tohyih pytth kri tim ṭryqh vaẓḥ th timne ṭryqn pytth pknavi tohyih yihnz pyrvy tohyih brvuntthim rtụ̄ lukh kran ạsụ̄, suh chuh pnnụ̄ rḥmt hyth tohyih kun ẓon pihrnuk airadh thavan th suh chuh zann vvl thi th dana thi.
Ā, Allah tʿālyā chuh tohyih pytth rḥmt san ẓon pihrun yczhan mgr yim lukh khod panh pnnhi nfs kyn khvahshatn hnz pyrvy kran chih tim chih yczhan zi tvhụ̄ gczihv syzi vathi nishhi ddlith dvur nyrnụ̄.
Allah tʿālyā chuh tohyih pytthh pabndyih lvczravnhi yczhan. Tikyazi ansan chuh āmut kmzvr pạd krnh.

Ae lvukv yimv ayman chuhv avnmut, panh vạnụ̄ mah khyyiv akh akụ̄ sndụ̄ mal bạṭil ṭryqv sintụ̄. Lyn dyn gczihh spdun akh akụ̄ snzi rẓa mndy san. (bạṭl ṭryqv nishhi chuh murad tim sạry ṭryqh yim ḥqs khlaf āsn th shrʿī th akhlaqy ṭvr āsn na jạyz. Akh akụ̄ snz rẓamndy nishhi chuh murad āzadanh th zannh mannh āmcz rẓamndy. Kunhi dbavs ya dvkhs th frybs pytth bnavnh āmczi rẓamndy hund nav gvv nh rẓamndy.) th pnun pan mah kriv qtl. (yih kth hykhi ptimhi kthhi hnz ptim han thi ạsith th panh thi hykhi mstql kth ạsith. Agr ptimhi kthhi hnz ptim han manvvn tylhi chuh aamiyuk mṭlb yih dvyimyn hund mal najạyz ṭvr khyvn chuh khod pnun pan hlakts mnz travun. Th agr yih mstql kth manvn tylhi chih ath zh mʿny, akh yih zi akh akụ̄ sund qtl mah kriv, byakh yih zi khodkshy mah kriv.) pczh kriv zi Allah tʿālyā chuh tohyih pytth mhrban.
Yus shkhṣ ẓlm v zyadty san yih kri suh travvn asụ̄ ẓrvr nars mnz th yih kạm chahnh Allah tʿālyā sndi khạṭr mushkl kynhh.

Agr tvhụ̄ timv bddyv bddyv gnahv nishhi prhyz kran rvuziv yimv nishhi tthakh chuhv yivan krnh tylhi krvkh asụ̄ tuhnz lokchhi mokchhi burạyiyih tuhndi ḥsabh nishhi dvur th tvhụ̄ krv ʿzt chih jayih dạkhl.

Th mah kriv tamiyuk tmna yikynczhah khudayn tohyih mnz kạnshi baqyn hndis mqabls mnz zyadh chuh diytmut, yikynczhah mrdav chuh kmvvmut tmhi muṭạbq chuh tihund ḥṣh th yikynczhah mstvratav chuh kmvvmut tmhi muṭạbq chuh tihund ḥṣh. Ā, khudays rvuziv tmụ̄ sndi fẓluk duʿā mngan, yqynaan chuh Allah tʿālyā prth chyzuk ʿlm thavan.

Th aashi chih tamhi prth trkkụ̄ ḥqdar muqrr krimtụ̄ yim valdyn th qryby rshth dar pth kun travn, vonụ̄ rvudụ̄ tim lukh yimn sintụ̄ tohyih ʿhd v pyman āsn timn diyiv pnun ḥiṣh, yqynaan chuh Allah tʿālyā prth chyzs pytth ngran. (ʿrbh kyn lukn hund avs qaʿdh zi yimn lukn drmyan dvsty th bạe bndtikụ̄ ʿhd v pyman spdan ạsụ̄ tim ạsụ̄ akh akụ̄ sndi myrathkụ̄ ḥqdar bnan. Yithe pạtthụ̄ yus nychv avs yivan bnavnh suthi avs mngth mạlụ̄ sund vạrth bnan. Yth āyts mnz chuh jạhlytuk yih ṭryqh mnsvkh krith frmavnh āmut zi vratht gczih tamhi qạʿdh muṭạbq rshth darn mnz tqsym spdnụ̄ yus aashi mqrr chuh kvrmut, albth yimn lukn sintụ̄ tohyih ʿhd v pyman āsn timn hykiv pnnhi zndgy mnz pnnhi mrẓy muṭạbq dith)

Mrd chih mstvratn pytth qvam, (qvam chih ts shkhṣs vnan yus kạnshi frds ya aidars ya niẓamkụ̄ mʿāmlat durst ḥalts mnz chlavnuk th aamich ḥfaẓt th rạchh ravtth krnuk th amikụ̄ ẓrvryat dstyab thavnuk dhimh dar āshi) ath bunyads pytth zi khudayn chhe timv mnz akis diczmcz dvyimis pytth fẓylt, th ath binahs pytth zi mrd chih pnnụ̄ mal khrch kran, vonụ̄ yimh ṣalḥ mstvrath chhe timh chhe frman brdar āsan th mrdn ptụ̄ kinụ̄ chhe Allah tʿālyā sndis ḥfaẓts th ngrạny mnz tihndyn ḥqvqn hnz ḥfaẓt kran th yimn mstvratn nishhi tohyih bdkhvby hund andyshhi āshi timh smjhạviyvukh, khvab gahav mnz rvuziv timn nishhi byvn th lạyvukh. (aath chuhnh yih mṭlb yih zi tryshve kamhi gczhn byk vqt krnh yinh, blkh chuh mṭlb yih zi bdkhvyy hndis ḥalts mnz chuh yimn tryshvnụ̄ ḥaltn hund ajazt. Vonụ̄ rvuz yimn pytth ʿml drāmd, tylhi gczihh bhrḥal aath mnz qṣvrs th szahs drmyan tnasub āsun, th yath jayih lothi vayih tdbyri sintụ̄ aṣlaḥ hykhi spdith tth jayih gczihh nh skht tdbyrs kạm hynụ̄. Ḥẓvr ṣly Allah ʿlyh v slmv yylhi thi khandarinyn layinuk ajazt chuh diytmut suh chuhkh badli nakhvasth diytmut th tvthi chuhkh yih chyz napsnd frmvvmut.) pth agr timh tuhnz frman brdar spdn tylhi mah kriyv khvah mkhvah timn pytth dst drạzy khạṭr bhanh tlash, yqyn thạviv zi pytthh knhi chuh Allah tʿālyā mvjvd yus bvdd th balatr chuh.

Th agr tohyih kunhi vizi khandars th khandarinhi hndụ̄ tʿlqat bigrnuk andyshhi āsyv. Tylhi kriyvun akh ḥakm mrd sndyv rshth darav mnz th akh zanhi hndyv rshth darv mnz muqrr, tim doshve (agr) aṣlaḥ yczhn krun tylhi karri Allah tʿālyā timn doshvnụ̄ drmyan mvafqtch ṣvrt. (doshvnụ̄ nishhi chuh murad thạlth thi th zh bạcz thi. Prth lrrayih mnz chuh ṣlḥ spdnuk amkan bshrṭykh doshve drụ̄ gczhn ṣlḥ psnd āsnụ̄ th mnzim thi gczhn yczhan āsnụ̄ zi don dryn mnz gczihh kunhi pạtthụ̄ ṣfạyy spdnụ̄.) Allah tʿālyā chuh svrue kynhh zanan th byyhi chuh bakhbr.

Th tvhụ̄ sạry kriv Allah tʿālyā snz bndgy, ts sintụ̄ mah bnaviyvun kanhh shryk, mạlis majhi sintụ̄ kriv nyk brtav, qrabt darn th ytymn th mskynn sintụ̄ kriv rut slvk th byyhi kriv hmsayih rshth dars sintụ̄ th ghyr zan hmsays sintụ̄ th sintụ̄ bạjis sintụ̄, (amhi nishhi chuh murad dvst yus sintụ̄ āshi th suh shkhṣ thi ys sintụ̄ kunhi jayih kunhi thi vqth pkun pyyih. Mthlaan tvhụ̄ chihv bazr nyran, byakh nfra thi chuh tohyih sintụ̄ pkan ya kunhi vans pytth ạsiv tvhụ̄ svda rattan th byakh kanhh khrydar thi āshi tohyih nishhi bihith, ya sfrs dvran āshi byyhi kanhh shkhṣ tuhund hmsfr. Yih ʿārẓy hmsaygy thi chhe prth mhdhb th shryf ansans pytth akh ḥq ʿạyd kran yymyuk tqaẓh yih chuh zi suh krin ḥty alamkan ts sintụ̄ nyk slvk th ts tklyf dinh nishhi rvuzin pth.) th msafrs sintụ̄ th timn lvnddy ghlamn sintụ̄ yim tuhndis qbẓs mnz āsn thạviv aḥsanuk mʿāmlh, yqyn thạviv Allah tʿālyā chuhnh tithis shkhṣs psnd kran yus pnins zchhrs mnz mghrvr āshi, byyhi kri pnnis bjrs pytth fkhr.

Th tithụ̄ lukh thi chihnh khudays psnd yim knjvsy kran chih th baqyn thi chih knjvsy hund hdayt divan. Th yikynczhah khudayn timn pnnhi fẓlh sintụ̄ diytmut chuh tth chih chuhpavan, nʿmtuk ankar krn valyn yithyn lukn khạṭr chuh aashi rusva krn vvl ʿdhab dstyab thvvmut.

Ạkhr kosh āft yiyhi he yimn lukn pytth agr yim khudays th ạkhrt kis dohs pytth ayman thavhan, th yikynczhah khudayn diytmut chuh tmhi mnz krhan khrch, hrgah yim yih krhn tylhi hykhi he nh khudays nishhi tihnzi nyky hund ḥal czhayih rvuzith.
Allah tʿālyā chuhnh kạnshi pytth dhrs brabr ẓlm kran agr kanhh akh nyky kri Allah tʿālyā chuh tth dognh kran th pth chuh pnnhi ṭrfh bvdd ajr ʿṭa kran.
Pth svunchiv zi tmhi vqth kya krn yim yylhi asụ̄ prth aumt mnz akh gvah aanvvn th yimn lukn pytth krav tvhụ̄ (yʿny Muḥammad) gvah sndi ḥythyt khrra.

Tmhi vqth krn tim sạry lukh tmna yimv rsvl ṣly Allah ʿlyh v slmn hnz kth mạnụ̄ nh th tihnz nafrmạny rvudụ̄ kran zi kash zmyn phtthi he th tim gczhn tthụ̄ mnz, tathi hykn nh tim pnnụ̄ kanhh kth khudays nishhi czvuri thạvith.

Ae lvukv yimv ayman chuhv avnmut, yylhi tvhụ̄ nashhi kis ḥalts mnz ạsiv tylhi gczhụ̄ ziyv nh nmazi nkhh. (yih chuh shrabs mtʿlq dvyum ḥukm goddniyuk ḥkm avs suh yus svrh bqrh āyt nmbr 219 has mnz āv) nmaz gczihh tmhi vqth prnụ̄ yylhi tohyih pe āshi zi tvhụ̄ kya chihv vnan. (yʿny nmazi mnz gczihh ansans yvutah hvsh rvzun z suh gczihh zanun zi suh kya chyz chuh pnnhi zbạnụ̄ sintụ̄ ada kran, thi gczihh nh āsun zi suh gczihh khrra nmaz prnh khạṭr th shrvʿ kri kanhh ghzl.) th yithe pạtthụ̄ mah gczihv jnabt kis ḥalts mnz thi nmazi nzdyk yvt tam nh ghsl kriv, (jnabt nishhi chuh murad so gndgy yosh mubashrt sintụ̄ ya nyndri dvran madh khạrij spdnh sintụ̄ laḥq chhe spdan.) aila yih zi vathi ạsiv pkan. (fqhahav th mufsrv mnz chuh akụ̄ drụ̄ aamhi āytuk yih mfhvm smjhmut zi jnabt kis ḥalts mnz gczihh nh msjdi mnz gczuhn aila yih zi kunhi kamhi khạṭr pyyih msjdi mnzụ̄ nyrun. Dvyum dvr chuh aamhi nishhi sfr murad nivan, yʿny agr ansan sfrkis ḥalts mnz āshi th jnabt spdys laḥq tylhi hykhi tymm krith.) th hrgah kunhi vizi yih spdi zi tvhụ̄ ạsiv bymar ya ạsiv sfrs mnz ya tohyih mnz āv kanhh shkhṣ rfʿii ḥajt (lvkutt bodd pyshab) krith ya tohyih āsyv khandarinyn sintụ̄ lams kvrmut. (ath kthhi mnz chuh akhtlaf zi lams yʿny chuhvun nishhi kya chuh murad? Varyahn aimamn hnz rae chih zi amhi nishhi chuh murad mubashrt th yhe rae chih amam abv ḥnyfh th tihndyv aṣḥabv akhtyar krmcz. Ath brʿks chuh kynczhn dvyimyn fqhahn nzdyk aamhi nishhi murad chuhvun ya athh lagun th yhe rae chhe amam shafʿī hn akhtyar krmcz. Amam malk hn hnz rae chhe zi agr mrd ya znanh akh akis shhvạny jdhbatv san athh lagn tylhi phutthi timn vẓv, albth agr shhvạny jdhbatv vrạe akụ̄ sund jsm dvyimis sintụ̄ mas (Touch) spdi tylhi chuhnh aath prvae.) th agr āb mylhi nh tylhi kriv pak myczi sintụ̄ tymm th aamhi sintụ̄ kriv pnnyn buthyn th aathn pytth msḥ, (ḥukmch tfṣyly ṣvrt chhe yih zi hrgah ansan be vẓv chuh ya ts chuh ghsluk ḥajt th āb chuhnh mylan tylhi hykhi tymm krith nmaz prith. Agr mryẓ chuh th ghusl ya vẓv krnh sintụ̄ chuhs nqṣanuk andyshhi tylhi hykhi āb āsnh bavjvd tymum kis ajazts fạydh tulith.) be shk chuh Allah tʿālyā nrmy kạm hynh vvl th mghfrt krn vvl.
Kya tohyih vuchhvukhh tim lukh thi yimn ktabhi hndi ʿlmuk kynhh ḥṣh dinh chuh āmut? Tim chih khod ẓlaltkụ̄ khrydar bnith, th yczhan chih zi tvhụ̄ thi ddliv vathi nishhi.
Allah tʿālyā chuh tuhndyn dushmnn tthyk pạtthụ̄ zanan th tuhndi ḥmayt th mddgạry khạṭr chuh bs Allah tʿālyā kạfy.

Yimv lukv yhvdytuk ṭryqh akhtyar chuh kvrmut timn mnz chih kynhh lukh yim lfẓn pnnhi jayih nishhi pihran chih. (ath chih tre mṭlb, akh yih zi Allah tʿālyā snzi ktabhi mnz chih rd v bdl kran. Dvyum yih zi pnnhi tavylh krụ̄ krụ̄ chih ktabhi hndyn āyatn hndy mʿny kthi pytthh kvr vatnavan. Samiʿnaa vaʿaaṣaynaa (yʿny yylhi timn Allah tʿālyā sndụ̄ aḥkam chih bvznavnh yivan th tim chih bddi vnan (samiʿaanaa) aashi bvuz th lothi chih vnan (ʿaaṣaynaa) aashi kvr nh qbvl. Ya chih aaṭaʿnaa ashi kvr qbvl lfẓuk tlfẓ tithh pạtthụ̄ zyv phrith krran zi suh chuh ʿaaṣaynaa bnan.) th aismaʿ ghayra musmaʿ. (yʿny dvrani gftgv yylhi tim kanhh kth Muḥammad ṣly Allah ʿlyh v slmn chih vannụ̄ yaczhan tylhi chih vanan, aismaʿ bvziv th pth chih sinty vanan, ghyr musmaʿ thi, yth zh mʿny chih: akh mṭlb chuhs zi tvhụ̄ chihv tithụ̄ mḥtrm zi tohyih yiyiv nh kanhh kth khlafi mrẓy bvznavnh. Dvym mṭlb chuhs zi tvhụ̄ chihv nh aath qạbil zi kanhh bvznavyv tohyih kynhh. Byakh akh mṭlb chuh yih zi Allah tʿālyā bvzin tvhụ̄ bniv zrụ̄.) byyhi chih vnan raaʿiinaa (aamich tshryḥ chhe svrh bqrh āyt nmbr 104 kis vẓaḥts mnz krnh āmcz.) ḥalankh agr tim vanhn samiʿnaa va aaṭʿnaa byyhi aismaʿ th aunẓurnaa tylhi avs yih tihindy khạṭr bhtr th yih avs zyadh rast bạzy hund ṭryqh mgr timn pytth chhe tihindi bạṭl prsty hndi bdvlt Allah tʿālyā snz lʿnt vczhmcz, amhi mvjvb chih tim kme phn ayman anan.

Ae timv lvukv yimn ktab ạs dinh āmcz mạniv so ktab yosh vonụ̄ aashi nạzil chhe krmcz th yosh ktab tth ktabhi tṣdyq th tạyyd chhe kran yosh tohyih nishhi godd pytthe mvjvd ạs aath pytth aniv ayman aamhi brvntth zi asụ̄ pihrv tuhndụ̄ buthụ̄ khrab krith pth kun ya tim krvkh tithe pạtthụ̄ lʿnt zdh yithh pạtthụ̄ sbt valyn sintụ̄ aashi kvrmut avs (vuchihv tshryḥ svrh bqrh āyt nmbr 65) th yad thạviv Allah tʿālyā sund ḥukm chuh nạfdh spdith rvzan.

Kya tohyih vuchhvukh tim lukh thi yim pnnhi nfsh chih pạkyzgy hndụ̄ sytthah dam chih divan? Ḥalankh pạkyzgy ys yczhan chuh ts chuh Allah tʿālyā ʿṭa kran th (yosh pạkyzgy timn mylan chahnh th drḥqyqt) chuhnh timn pytth dhrs brabr ẓlm yivan krnh.
Vuchihtv, yim chihnh khudays pytth thi aapuz alzam lagns hirash kran, th tihndi ttakarh gnah gar āsnh khạṭr chuh yohe akh gnah kạfy.

Kya tohyih vuchhvukh na tim lukh yimn ktabhi hndi ʿlmh mnz kynhh ḥṣh chuh dinh āmut th tihund ḥal chuh yih zi tim chih jibt th ṭaghvt manan. (jibt, aath chih mʿne be ḥqyqt, be aṣl th be fạydh chyz. Ṭaghvt, tshryḥ khạṭr vuchuhv svrh bqrh āyt nmbr 256) byyhi chih kạfrn mtʿlq vnan zi ayman aann valyv khoth chih yime zyadh ṣḥyḥ vathi pytth (yth jayih chih kạfr murad mshrkyni ʿrb)
Yithy lukh chih yimn pytth khdayn lʿnt chhe krmcz th ys pytth khudae lʿnt kri pth vuchhvun nh tvhụ̄ tmụ̄ sund kanhh mddgar.

(yad gczihh thavun zi yath jayih chuh bny asrạʿyl chan ḥạsdanh kthn jvab dinh yivan. Aamhi jvabuk mṭlb chuh yih zi ạkhr kth kthhi pytth chihv tvhụ̄ lukh dazan? Aashi yus vʿdh abrahym ʿlyh alslamn sintụ̄ dunya kh aimamtuk kvrmut avs suh avs āl abrahym mnz ṣrf timn lukn khạṭr yim sanhi svznh āmczi ktabhi hnz th ḥkmtch pyrvy krn. Vonụ̄ diyut aashi sue chyz bny asmaʿīls th yih chhe yihnz khosh nṣyby zi yimav chuh aath pytth ayman avnmut.)

Yimv lukv sạnụ̄ āyat mannh nishhi ankar chuh kvrmut tim travvkh asụ̄ yqynaan nars mnz th yylhi tihindi jsmuk mslh glith moklhi th tth jayih krv asụ̄ byakh mslh pạd, takh tim vuchahn tthyk pạtthụ̄ ʿdhabuk mzh, Allah tʿālyā chuh bdd qdrt thavan th pnnụ̄ fạṣlh ʿmlavnch ḥkmt chuh tthyk pạtthụ̄ zanan.

Mslmanv, Allah tʿālyā chuh tohyih ḥkm divan zi amant kriv ahli amantn ḥvalh th yylhi lukn drmyan fạṣlh kriv tylhi kriv ʿdlh san, (yʿny tvhụ̄ rvuzụ̄zyv timv burạyv nishhi bchith yimn mnz bny asrạʿyl mbtla chih spdụ̄mtụ̄. Bny asrạʿyl chv bnyady ghlṭyv mnz ạs akh ghlṭy yih zi timv lạgụ̄ pnnis anḥṭaṭ kis zmans mnz amant, yʿny dhmh dạry hndụ̄ mnṣb th mdhhby pyshvạyy th qvmy srdạry hndụ̄ mrtbh tithyn lukn dinụ̄ yim naahl, km ẓrf, bdakhlaq, bddyant th bdkar ạsụ̄. Khvah kạnshi sintụ̄ dvsty āsyv ya dshmny, bhr ḥal yylhi kth vniv anṣafch vniv th yylhi fạṣlh kriv ʿdlh san kriv.) Allah tʿālyā chuhv tohyih varyah rcz nṣyḥt kran. Th pzụ̄ pạtthụ̄ chuh Allah tʿālyā svrue kynhh bvzan th vuchhan.

Ae lvukv yimv ayman chuhv avnmut, aṭaʿt kriv Allah tʿālyā snz th aṭaʿt kriv rsvl ṣly Allah ʿlyh v slmn hnz th timn lukn hnz yim tohyih mnz ṣaḥbi aamr āsn pth hrgah tohyih drmyan kunhi mʿāmls mnz tnazʿh spdi tylhi pihriyvun suh khudays th rsvl ṣly Allah ʿlyh v slms kun. (yih āyt chih aslam kh pvur mdhhby, tmdny th syạsy nẓamch bunyad th aslạmy ryast kh dstvrch avlyn dfʿh. Ath mnz chih ḥsbi dhyl czvr aṣvl mstql ṭvr qạyim krnh āmtụ̄: (1) aslạmy nẓams mnz chuh aṣl muṭaʿ ys aṭaʿt yiyhi krnh Allah tʿālyā. Akh mslman chuh sarive brvnhh Allah tʿālyā sund bndh, baqy yikynczhah chuh thi chuh amhi pth. (2) aslạmy nẓamch dvyum bunyad chhe rsvl Allah ṣly Allah ʿlyh v slmn hnz aṭaʿt. (3) yimv doyv aṭaʿtv pth chhe yimn matḥt rvuzith tryyim aṭaʿt muslmann hndyn auvly alamrn hnz yim khod muslmanv mnz āsn. Auvly alamar kis mfhvms mnz chih tim sạry lukh shamil yim muslmann hndyn ajtmạʿī mʿāmlatn hndụ̄ srbrahi kar āsn, khvah tim ʿlmaʿ āsn ya syạsy rhnmạyy krn vạlụ̄ lyddr āsn ya mlky antẓam krn vạlụ̄ ḥạkm ya ʿdalty fạṣlh krn vạlụ̄ jj ya tmdny th muʿāshrty amvrn mnz qbyln th bstiyn th mḥln hnz srbrạhy krn vạlụ̄ zitthụ̄, bzrg th srdar āsn. (4) Allah tʿālyā sund ḥkm th rsvl ṣly Allah ʿlyh v slmn hund ṭryqh chuh bnyạdy qanvn th ạkhry sanad. Muslmann drmyan ya ḥkvmts th ʿūams drmyan yath msls mnz thi nizaʿ pạd gczihh tth mnz yiyhi fạṣlh khạṭr qrāns th sunts kun rjvʿ krnh th yus fạṣlh tvr ḥạṣl spdi tth brvntthh knhi nvmravan sạry pnun sr th krn tslym.) agr tohyih pzụ̄ pạtthụ̄ khudays th ạkhrt kis dohs pytth ayman chuhv, yohe chuh akh ṣḥyḥ ṭryqh kar th anjam kh aʿtbar thi chuh bhtr.

Ae nby! Pth kya chuh tmhi vizi spdan yylhi yihndyn pnnyn aathn hund avnmut mṣybt yimn pytth yivan chuh? Tmhi vqth chih yim tohyih nishhi qsm khyvan khyvan yivan th vnan chih, khudae sund qsm asụ̄ ạsụ̄ ṣrf rczr yczhan th sạnụ̄ nyt ạs yih zi fryqn drmyan gczihh kunhi pạtthụ̄ mvafqt spdnụ̄.

(arshad chuh timn mẓlvm shuryn, mstvratn th mrdn kun yimav mks mnz ʿrbh kyn baqy qbyln mnz aslam avs qbvl kvrmut mgr nh ạsụ̄ hjrt krith hykan th nh ạsụ̄ pnun pan ẓulmh nishhi bchạvith hykan, yim be ks ạsụ̄ rngh rngh tkhth mshq bnavnh yivan th dʿā ạsụ̄ mngan zi kanhh gvczh timn aamhi ẓlmh nishhi bchavun)

Kya tohyih vuchhvukh tim lukh thi yimn vannh avs āmut zi pnnụ̄ aathh thạviv path th nmaz kriv qạyim th zkvāh diyiv? Vonụ̄ yylhi timn lrrayih hund ḥukm āv dinh, pth chuh yimav mnz akis fryq sund ḥal yih zi lukn chih tithh pạtthụ̄ khoczan yithh pạtthụ̄ khdays pzi khoczun ya tamhi khoth thi zyade. (yʿny agr tvhụ̄ Allah tʿālyā sndi dynch khdmt bja aniv th tmụ̄ snzi vathi andr hạviv janfshạny tylhi chuhnh yih mmkn zi khudays nishhi kya gczihh tuhund ajr ẓaʿʿ.)

Rvud vonụ̄ mvt, tvhụ̄ yth jayih thi ạsiv bhr ḥal rvzi suh tvurụ̄ vạtith khvah tvhụ̄ ạsitv kiczhn mẓbvṭ ʿmartn mnz. Yymụ̄ rsvl snz aṭaʿt kr tmụ̄ kr draṣl Allah tʿālyā snz aṭaʿt th yymụ̄ buth pihyur, bhrḥal chihv nh aashi tvhụ̄ lukn pytth rạchhdr bnạvith svuzimtụ̄.

Tim chih brvnhh knhi vnan zi aashi kr frmanch aṭaʿt mgr yylhi tohyih nishhi nyran chih th yimn mnz chuh akh dvr rạczn mnz jmʿ spdith tuhnzn kthn khlaf mshvrh kran. Allah tʿālyā chuh yihnz yimh sare sir kthh lykhan tvhụ̄ mah kriv yuhund prvae th khudays pytth thạviv bhrvsh sue chuh bhrvss khạṭr kạfy.

Ys khudayn lʿnt kr (shyṭans chuhnh ath mʿnys mnz kanhh thi mʿbvd bnavan zi ts brvntthh knhi āshi bndgy hndy rsm ada kran th ts āshi alvhytuk drjhi divan. Amhi nishhi lvg pe zi czhoph dm krith th achh ttuvith aṭaʿt th pyrvy krnuk nav thi chuh ʿbadt, th yus shkhṣ amhi qsmch aṭaʿt kran chuh suh chuh draṣl ts shkhṣh snz ʿbadt kran yus tmụ̄ khudae trạvith pnun muṭaʿ āshi bnvvmut. Tim chih ts shyṭan snz aṭaʿt kran.) yymụ̄ khudays avs vvnmut zi, bh hymh chanyn bndn akh mqrr ḥṣh ẓrvr. (yʿny yihndyn avqatn mnz, yihnzn mḥntn th kvushshn mnz, yihnzn quvtn th qạblytn mnz, yihndis mals th yihndyn avladn mnz lgav bh panun ḥṣh th tithh pạtthy phsavkh zi yim krn yimn sarine chyzn hund akh bvdd ḥṣh myanhi vathi mnz khrch.)

Bh ddalkh yim, bh phsavakh yim ṭmʿ hn mnz, bh dimh yimn ḥkm th myanhi ḥukmh din yim janvrn knan trth. (ahli ʿrbn hndyv tvhmatv mnz chuh akis kun aisharh. Tihund akh qạʿdh avs zi yylhi avnttinhi panczhh ya dah bchhi zyvhan, ts ạsụ̄ knn trth dith pnnis dyvta sndis navs pytth ylh travan th ts kạm hynụ̄ avs ḥram yivan zannh. Yithe pạtthụ̄ yymis avntth sndi nṭfh sintụ̄ dah bchhi zyvhan suthi avs dyvta sndis navs pytth ṣdqh rngụ̄ ylh travnh yivan th kns trth diyun ạs amhi kthhi hnz ʿlamt zi yih chuh khyrat rngụ̄ ylh trvanh āmut janvr.) th bh dimh yimn ḥkm th yim krn myanhi ḥukmh khudayy sakhts mnz rd v bdl. (khudayy sakhts mnz rd v bdl krnuk mṭlb chuhnh chyzn hndis pydạyshy bnavtts mnz rd v bdl krun kynhh blkh yth jayih yath rd v bdls shyṭạny kạm chhe vannh āmcz so chhe yih zi ansan hyyih kunhi chyzs so kạm yymhi khạṭr khdayn suh pạd chuhnh kvrmut, th kunhi chyzs hyyih nh so kạm yymhi khạṭr suh khudayn pạd chuh kvrmut. Dvyimyn lfẓn mnz vanav timh sare kamhi yimh ansan pnnis th baqy chyzn hndis fṭrts khlaf chuh kran, th timh tmam ṣvurth yimh suh fṭrt khi mnshhi nishhi czalnh khạṭr akhtyar chuh kran. Yymhi āyt mvjvub chih shyṭan sndụ̄ gmrah kun tḥrykat yim, qvmi lvṭch ʿml, ẓbiṭ vladt, rhbạnyt, nytr vrạe rvzun, mrd th znanh hantth bnavnhi, mrd bnavun namrd, znanh timv kamyv nishhi muchhhi thavnhi yimh fṭrtan timn ḥvalh chhe krimcz th timh tmdun kyn timn shʿbn mnz khkhri aannh yimn khạṭr mrd chuh pạd āmut krnh.) yih shyṭan yymụ̄ kạnshi akụ̄ khudays bjae yih pnun vly th srprst bnvv suh pyv nanhi vanh khsars mnz.
Suh chuh yimn lukn sintụ̄ vʿdh kran th yimn chuh amyd divan mgr shyṭan sndụ̄ sạry vʿdh chihnh fryb vrạe byyhi kihinụ̄.
Yimn lukn hund tthkanh chuh jhnm yymhi nishhi yim moklnch kanhh ṣvrt lbn nh.

Rvudụ̄ tim lukh yim ayman aann th nyk ʿmlh krn tim krvkh asụ̄ tithyn baghn mnz dạkhl yimn bnụ̄ kinụ̄ kolh āsn pkan, tim rvzn tathi hmyshh hmyshh khạṭr, yih chuh Allah tʿālyā sund pvz vʿdh th khudays khoth kus āshi pnnhi kthhi mnz pziyvr.
Anjam kar (ʿdhab th thvab) nah chuh tuhndyn ārizuvan pytth mvqvf nh ahli ktabn hndyn ārzuvan pytth, yus akha burạyy kri tamyuk phl lbhi suh th khudays mqablh lbhi nh pnnhi khạṭr kanhh ḥạmy th mddgar.
Th yus akha nyk ʿml kri, khvah suh mrd ạsitn ya znanh, bshrṭykhi āshi mvmn tylhi gczhn yithy lukh jnts mnz dạkhl th timn spdi nh zars sumb ḥq tlfy.

Ts shkhṣh sndi khoth bhtr kmụ̄ sund ṭryqi zndgy hykhi bhtr ạsith yymụ̄ khudays brvntthh knhi pnun klh nvmrvv, th pnun rviyih thvvun nyk th yk suv spdith krn abrahym sndi ṭryqch pyrvy, tas abrahym sndi ṭryqch pyrvy yus khudayn pnun dvst avs bnvvmut.
Āsmann th zmyns mnz yikynczhah chuh, suh chuh Allah tʿālyā sund, th Allah tʿālyā chuh prth chyzs pytth aḥaṭh krith.

Lukh chihv tohyih mstvratn hndis mʿāmls mnz ftvyā prczhan. (yih chuhnh āmut vannh zi kya ftvyā ạsụ̄ prczhan. Albth āyt 128 pytthh 130 has mnz yus ftvyā dinh āmut chuh tmhi sintụ̄ chhe svalch nvʿīt fikri tran.) vniv, Allah tʿālyā chuhv tohyih tihindis mʿāmls mnz ftvyā divan. Th sinty chuhv tim aḥkam thi yad pavan yim goddh pytthe tohyih yth ktabhi mnz chih bvznavnh yivan, yʿny tim aḥkam yim timn ytym kvryn mtʿlq chih yihndụ̄ ḥq tvhụ̄ ada chihv nh kran th yihndụ̄ nkaḥ krns mnz tvhụ̄ baz chihv rvzan. (ya chihv lalchhi hndis bnyads pytth panh yczhan tvhụ̄ timn sintụ̄ nkaḥ krun.) (targhabuvna an tankiḥuvhun, aamyuk mṭlb hykhi yithi ạsith zi tohyih chahv yimn sintụ̄ nkaḥ krnch rghbt th yithi hykhi ạsith zi tohyih chuhv nh yimn sintụ̄ nkaḥ psnd.) th tim aḥkam yim timn shuryn mtʿlq chih yimn be charn kanhh ṭaqt chuhnh, Allah tʿālyā chuhv tohyih hdayt divan zi ytymn sintụ̄ rvuziv anṣafs pytth qạyim, th yus rczar tvhụ̄ kriv suh rvzi nh Allah tʿālyā sndi ʿlmh nishhi khttith.

Agr kạnshi znanhi pnnis khandars nishhi bdslvky ya be rukhy hund khṭrh āshi, (yythi pytth chuh lukn hndi svaluk jvab shrvʿ spdan, sval avs yih zi akhi khoth zạyid khandarnhi āsnkis ṣvrts mnz yus ʿdluk ḥukm chuh dinh āmut tath pytth kithh pạtthụ̄ yiyhi ʿml krnh yylhi zn akh khandarnụ̄ chhe hmyshh bymar (daymu almrẓ) ya jsmạny rạbṭs qạbl chahnh rvuzmcz. Nfs chih tng dily kun jldy mạyl spdan albth agr tvhụ̄ lukh aḥsan san pysh yiyiv th khudạe khvfs hyyiv kạm tylhi thạviv pczh zi Allah tʿālyā āshi nh tuhndi aamhi ṭrzi ʿmlh nishhi be khbr.

(yymhi āyth nishhi chuh kynczhv yih ntyjhi kvddmut zi qrān chuh akhi pash ʿdlh kh shrṭh san tʿdadi azvajuk ajazt divan th dvymhi pash chuh ʿdls nammkn qrar dith yih ajazt ʿmlaan mnsvkh kran. Tylhi yiyhi he yih ntyjhi krrnh mgr amhi pte chuh yih frmavnh āmut zi, lhādha nmụ̄zyv nh balkle akụ̄se khanadrinhi kun. Aamhi kthhi thvv nh kanhh mvqʿ amhi mṭlbh khạṭr pth kun yus msyḥy yvurps tqlyd krn vạlụ̄ ḥẓrat aamhi nishhi krrun chih yczhan.) agr tvhụ̄ pnun ṭrzi ʿml durst thạviv th khudays rvuziv khoczan Allah tʿālyā chuh chshm pvushy krn vvl th rḥm krn vvl.
Albth agr zh bạcz akh akis nishhi byvne spdn, Allah tʿālyā kri pnnhi vsyʿ qdrt sintụ̄ doshvnụ̄ akh akụ̄ snzi mḥtajy nishhi be nyaz, Allah tʿālyā sund damn chuh varyah kushadh th suh chuh dana v byna.

Āsmann th zmyns mnz yikynczhah chuh svrue chuh Allah tʿālyā sundue, tohyih brvnhh yimn ashi ktab diczmcz ạs, timn thi avs yohe hdayt diytmut th vonụ̄ chihv tohyih thi yohe hdayt divan zi khudays khvuczụ̄ khvuczụ̄ rvuziv kạm kran. Ā, bs khdae chuh mạlk timn sarine chyzn hund yim āsmann mnz chih th yim zmyns andr chih th karsạzy khạṭr chuh bs sue kạfy.
Hrgah suh yyczihh tohyih httạvith aanhi suh baqyn tuhnzi jayih th suh chuh aamich pvur qdrt thavan.
Yus shkhṣ mḥẓ dunya kh thvabuk ṭạlb āshi tas gczihh pe āsnụ̄ zi khudays nishhi chuh thvabi dnya th thvabi ạkhrt thi, th Allah tʿālyā chuh smyʿ v bṣyr (bvzn vvl thi th vuchhn vvl thi).

(ayman aann valyn vanun zi ayman aniv chuh bẓạhr ʿjyb basan. Mgr yth jayih chuh lfẓ ayman don alg mʿnyin mnz vartavnh āmut. Rvudụ̄ tim lukh yimv ayman avn, pth kvrukh kufr, pth avnukh byyhi ayman, pth kvrukh byyhi kufr, pth rvudụ̄ pnnis kufrs mnz brvnhh pkan, Allah tʿālyā kri nh hrgz timn mʿāf th nh havi timn siyz vath.
Munafqn diyiv khosh khbr tihndi khạṭr chuh dg tulvun ʿdhab tyar.
(tikyazi) yim chih ahli aymann trạvith kạfrn pnnụ̄ rfyq bnavan. Kya yim lukh chha ʿzt czhanddnhi timn nishhi gczhan? Ḥalankh ʿzt chuh andhyth Allah tʿālyā se khạṭr.

Khudayn chuh yth ktabhi mnz godde yih ḥkm diytmut zi yth jayih tvhụ̄ bvuziv zi Allah tʿālyā sndyn āyatn khlaf chuh kufr yivan bknh th yimn chuh hzl yivan krnh tathi mah rvuziv timn nishhi bihith yvt tam nh lukh byyhi kunhi kathhi kun lgn, vonụ̄ hrgah tvhụ̄ yih kran chihv tylhi chihv tvhụ̄ thi timne hivụ̄, pczh kriv zi Allah tʿālyā chuh mnafqn th kạfrn jhmns mnz akise jayih jmʿ krn vvl.

Yim munafq chih tuhndis mʿāmls mnz praran, (mṭlb vav vuchihth chih nav travan) agr Allah tʿālyā sndi ṭrfh ftḥ tuhnz spz pth yin th vnan zi kya asụ̄ ạsụ̄ na tohyih sintụ̄? Kufrs th aymans drmyan chuhkh tdhbdhb, nah chih pvur yvrkn nah chih pvur hvr kn, yus khudayn ddvlmut āshi ts khạṭr hykiv nh tvhụ̄ kanhh vath lbith. (yʿny yymụ̄ Allah tʿālyā sndi klamh nishhi th tmụ̄ sndis rsvl ṣly Allah ʿlyh v slmn hndi syrt nishhi hdayt āshi nh lvbmut, yus pzr nishhi ddlith th bạṭl prsty kun rạghb vuchihth khudayn thi āshi tvurụ̄ kun pihyurmut yvr kun suh panh phyrun yczhan avs th yymụ̄ sndi ẓlalt czhanddnh kh vjhi kinụ̄ khudayn āsn ts pytth hdaytkụ̄ drvazh bnd krimtụ̄ th ṣrf āsns gumrạhy hndy yạtụ̄ drvazh ylh trạvimtụ̄, yithis shkhṣs siyz vath havnụ̄ chuhnh draṣl kạnshi ansans tam.)
Ae lvukv yimv ayman chuhv avnmut, mvmn trạvith mah bnạviyvukh kạfr pnnụ̄ rfyq, kya tvhụ̄ chihvh yczhan zi khudays diyiv pans khlaf ttakar ḥujt?

Th amụ̄ ghlṭ tṣvrn ditụ̄ mvul zi khudayn chuh khod pnun pan ya pnnyv aazly ṣfatv mnz nṭq v klamuk ṣft msyḥ snzi shklhi mnz ẓạhr kvrmut.) th akh rvḥ avs khudae sndi ṭrfh (yymụ̄ mrym ʿlyha alslamn hnzi bchhi danhi mnz shurụ̄ snz shkl akhtyar kr. Yithh pạtthụ̄ āv khdays th msyḥ ʿlyh alslams sintụ̄ akh tryym khda rvḥu alquds bnavnh) lhādha, aniv tvhụ̄ khdays th tmụ̄ sndyn rsvln pytth ayman th nh mah vniv zi tre chih. Msyḥ ʿlyh alslamn hndụ̄ ttakar qvl yim anjyln mnz mylan chih tihndis bnyads petth hykhi nh kanhh ʿīsạe ath ankar krith zi khudae chuh bs aakve khudae, th ts vrạe chuhnh byyhi kanhh khudae. Tihndi khạṭr chuhnh yih tslym krnh vrạe chare kanhh zi tvḥyd chuh aṣly dyn mgr amhi bavjvd chih tim msyḥ ʿlyh alslamn hndis dhats andr ghulv kh bạʿth tthlythkụ̄ qạyl thi, th az tam hykụ̄ nh yih fạṣlh krith zi yimn don mutẓad ʿqydn kithh pạtthụ̄ pknavn yikh vtth.) baz yiyiv, yih chuh tuhndy khạṭr bhtr, khudae chuh bs aakve khudae, suh chuh pak amhi nishhi zi kanhh āshi ts nychuv. (yih chhe ʿīsayn hndi czvurimhi ghulvvch trdyd. ʿīsạe rvayat agr ṣḥyḥ thi āsn tvthi chuh timv mnz (khṣvṣaan goddnichv tryyv anjylav nishhi) zyadh khoth zyadh bs yutue thạbt spdan zi msyḥ ʿlyh alslamav avs khudays th bndn hndis tʿluqs mạlis th avlad sndis tʿluqs sintụ̄ hishr diytmut th mvl lfẓ ạsụ̄ tim khudays khạṭr mḥẓ mjạzy ṭvr th astʿārh rngụ̄ vrtavan. Yih chahnh ṣrf msyḥ ʿlyh alslamn hnze yạcz khṣvṣyt blkh ạsụ̄ pranhi zmanh pytthh bny asrạʿyl khudays khạṭr mvl lfẓ vartavan pkan, th amichhi varyah mithalh chhe baʿybl kis prạnis ʿhd nams mnz mvjvd. Ae nby, lvukh chihv tohyih (kalaalh kis mʿāmls mnz fatvyā) prczhan. (kalalh kis mʿnys mnz chuh akhtlaf. Kynczhn hnz rae chhe zi klalh chuh suh shkhṣ yus la vld āshi th ys mvl buddibb zndh āshi nh.
